documents.document: Good day my Friends! Its rainy, raw cold here in Massachusetts Wishing you a great day Peace Joy Love https://t.co/gIKHmZanuO

A stop in Kelheim on a #Danube cruise I took a few years ago. There was a beer fest going on but I chose to roam over the magnificent hills with views of the winding river below. https://t.co/NUWjlPgFlU
These pretty Cardinals keep chasing away a small bird. Cardinals are the official bird of my home state, Kentucky https://t.co/0kdsN4du96
I love the sound of the chimes https://t.co/wj8K1cqRtY
Check out my stepsons website; https://t.co/K8uJ3hCdqf Today he was working on a video for patient pop
These photos I took are Aquinnah https://t.co/iLkba21CsH

Today is the exciting Kentucky Derby, which Ive been to many times in my hometown, Louisville, KY. But it is a sad time for me because my older sister Mary died in a car accident on Derby day when she was 40 yrs old. (not her fault) https://t.co/k7hW5bHIsv
Father son (Ron) Ron makes videos commercials for companies like Nike. Hes always in demand, even through the pandemic. https://t.co/ywbIg7ALyp
The dogs love Ron, my stepson visiting from Santa Monica, CA https://t.co/nBmm8i4elC
Beau likes watching all the action in the fields https://t.co/AndWMEcqvr
Lots of dandelions In front of the tractor are water tanks were moving up to the top field from the lower ones https://t.co/E5qk49X9P5
What a day! Gorgeous weather after crazy turbulence yesterday with strong gusty winds leaving power outages many trees down throughout Massachusetts. Mother Nature! https://t.co/cOrwFYIj2k
Santa Monica sunsets I cant wait to get back there! My stepson, who is visiting now, is from there https://t.co/FZJGP5k7UK
Beautiful Aquinnah on Marthas Vineyard The lighthouse the famous clay cliffs https://t.co/A7kUeoUNOs
RT @whiteteddybear5: @JuliaGrantham2 HiJuliaBeautiful photo of you with Max Lilly Enjoy your time with your stepsonIt's the most

My stepson is visiting from California We havent seen him for over a year so we are thrilled to have him Ill be less engaged here for a few weeks. Stay safe, be healthy Peace Joy Love To All https://t.co/oxlyEmEWmE
Can we please go for a run? Bored Maxx https://t.co/0No8gnu7sK
Sounds of early morning on a farm: dogs barking, birds singing #smallbusinessowner Have a fantastic day my Friends! https://t.co/fN8F2j8AVW
Lining up for breakfast. Notice the order, Lilly first Beau is last https://t.co/asZ6WkexpQ
Is it dinner time? Lilly the #rescuedog https://t.co/RkZzCZAguM
Jack again. He no longer has to wear his mask in school. He his brother have been in school in Texas full time since last September https://t.co/v9ffzb5Tiy
My grandson Jack in his fancy new Nikes https://t.co/suKjgkvSIE
Silly Maxx https://t.co/jbaGY0UH4d
Playful dogs having fun today on a beautiful spring day https://t.co/y1nOC5RTlo
This picture always moves me: the woman was so touched by the shelter dog who jumped onto her lap fell asleep that she rescued him took him home with her, his forever home https://t.co/sD1LQgibsA
Marthas Vineyard with the charming Oak Bluffs cottages behind me https://t.co/TtPFlyDxAW
On fabulous Elbow Beach, with its stunning pink sand, in #Bermuda I long to travel again! https://t.co/6suiv2CP7J
@LesleyJ96294501 Thats wonderful Lesley! My uncle was in the Korean War too.
RT @LesleyJ96294501: @JuliaGrantham2 God bless them all for their service. You are in a blessed family. I've learned that my ancestor
@LesleyJ96294501 Hi Lesley, TY for your support of Vets. My husband was an Army Ranger with a Bronze Star for Valor 3 Purple Hearts my family have been Vets back to the Revolution
Good morning! Happy Day to All https://t.co/nNZwoxrK2a
Pretty Lilly https://t.co/gDp5PK5o81
Beau just got groomed https://t.co/nvXGbMmu1u
RT @AP: BREAKING: U.S. health officials say fully vaccinated Americans don't need to wear masks outdoors anymore unless they are in a big c
Two male turkeys fanning out their tails to impress the lady establish their territory. This blustery stance, advance then retreat, is driving my dogs crazy https://t.co/V1lnrKwF4A
What a stunning sunrise! Gorgeous day with birds singing https://t.co/V2V6DvqPLB
Goodnight my wonderful Friends Thank you for your kind comments, likes, follows retweets I appreciate you! Wishing you a lovely week Peace Joy Love to All https://t.co/F60UI0rVJr
RT @JuliaGrantham2: I spent the night in this magnificent medieval French fortified city of Carcassonne. Magical! https://t.co/aDqHKOs0XG
RT @JuliaGrantham2: The famous bridge in Giverny, France near Paris where the artist Monet lived painted. https://t.co/eMTSyBqr07
RT @JuliaGrantham2: Guess whos sitting with me? Beau! Happy, inspiring new week my wonderful Friends https://t.co/iWFpsN
Restaurants struggle with short staffing as more people return to dining. https://t.co/TEUJMG6P4V

Listen to that loud bird! The dogs want to go to the large field but right now the turkeys are there they are clumsy getting themselves out of the field. Not that the dogs harm them but the turkeys get rattled seem to forget that they can fly quite easily https://t.co/hTTo5xo5vw
Poor Maxx is sick again with allergies. Im waiting for a vet appointment #Vizsla https://t.co/2bpTU42DL2
@whiteteddybear5 Good day dear Isa! Wishing you a beautiful new week Bisous et un norme clin ma belle #friendsacrosstheocean https://t.co/HUbxwbXUbx
RT @whiteteddybear5: @JuliaGrantham2 HelloJuliaBeautiful video in a very nice place Thanks for sharingWishing you a lovely Monda
@Studyleaks Hi Audrey! Our household is always up at 5 am, 3 dogs included. As an attorney, when I was working for a global company, I was at work at 5 am like all the other executives
5:30 am and the full moon is still out, low on the horizon. Birds are singing, welcoming in a beautiful sunny, warm day https://t.co/Lob36JOoaP
I love the sound of birds trilling chirping, the magnificent sounds of life nature. Winter silence is so stark without these glorious sounds of joy https://t.co/pYtSqq5q0g
We have many deer they eat the tulips. But these planted close to the house have a chance of surviving https://t.co/uwqBX0fsYL
The tulips are blooming https://t.co/yttY03oDWK
RT @JuliaGrantham2: Happy Sunday https://t.co/sRKEOJdHlE

RT @JuliaGrantham2: My daughter her son Jack a few years ago. I miss them I miss Texas. https://t.co/RsHno7gwTe

RT @JuliaGrantham2: @whiteteddybear5 Now thats a relaxed dog, Dear Isa, like Max Bonne nuit chre Isa je tenvoie toute ma tendresse

@DisneyParks Beautiful amazing!
Lol, in fact I will turn my back on you Silly Lilly #rescuedog https://t.co/4UJvP91crR
Lilly: I know you are there but Im going to ignore you, if you leave https://t.co/iGGqw0JdGy
On my evening stroll I often end up here, the end of the road where I can see distant mountains. It is so serene https://t.co/vhm7hytHMa
@chasfenwick Oh my goodness, I would not have expected that. 3s company or 3s a crowd double your trouble with 2. I once dated a man who was one of triplets. Did the other two stay friendly?

Out for an evening stroll it is so lovely to have sunlight at 7 pm This is our rock garden from stones found on the farm Goodnight my wonderful Friends Wishing you peace joy throughout the weekend https://t.co/dj2RiA8HRn
Im with my good friends, twin brothers, celebrating their birthday. I always thought it must be fantastic to have a twin sister https://t.co/VF1obm2Bdw
Maxs 1st winter just discovering what fun a tennis ball can be #Vizsla https://t.co/3yISs13B9p
3 years ago on Marthas Vineyard when Maxx was smaller than Lilly He turns 4 in August Time flies! https://t.co/MQYPWeYpwW
RT @JuliaGrantham2: What can I say? Crazy Maxx Hes full of personality https://t.co/kdbYlEYWJm
RT @whiteteddybear5: @JuliaGrantham2 Hello Julia Beautiful pic, I love it TYSM for your wishes and friendship Wishing you too a
Walking around the neighborhood, admiring the beautiful, fluffy cumula nimbus clouds https://t.co/oAj4ZDQTmw

@Craig_A_Spencer Indentations of the goggles touched my heart. My son-in-law, a dr who had covid patients, would call at night to help me, in another state, navigate health issues it was those indentationsthat made his sacrifices so clear. God bless you doctors
Silly Maxx His idea of making the bed: mess it up, throw pillows off, give orders Maxx, the Alpha Male Vizsla https://t.co/F31tR2bxBT
Maxx likes wearing his red bandana #Vizsla https://t.co/P0uk3hUHrv
Spring flowers still blooming Happy day to All! https://t.co/OHfQmjyh1e
Good Morning Friends! Look what made me smile this morning My friends grandson, born a month ago https://t.co/UovLPGUf5q

@Amber02150 Congratulations Heather! I had my vaccine too

Happy Patriots Day to my Friends in Massachusetts! It is a holiday here when we usually have the Boston Marathon, but this year it will be in the fall. So I took a long walk in this beautiful park https://t.co/tao8MrZUDy
@HeidiStea Fantastic Heidi! Im so happy for you
@Amber02150 I havent been into Boston for a while. Your pictures are enticing spring in Boston is so lovely
RT @Amber02150: A great PatriotsDay to american people living in Massachusetts by me Harvard Campus in Cambridge and Newbury Street
Guess whos sitting with me? Beau! Happy, inspiring new week my wonderful Friends https://t.co/iWFpsNYPbz
Were out getting the fields ready to plant Maxx is a big help, as you can see https://t.co/UN7CJUIODD
@TapardeaA Thank you! I miss seeing them but they live in Texas Im in Massachusetts
@WendyPositively Sadly, That was years ago. I havent traveled or seen them since Xmas a year ago. With my cancer, lymphoma, I couldnt see anyone from March to august last year
The 3 of Snow is melting fast in todays sunshine. Lilly is ready to go out play https://t.co/OpATfuS0RD
RT @LoriShemek: @JuliaGrantham2 Thank you sweet you! So kind!
RT @JuliaGrantham2: @LoriShemek Great book Lori! I gave it 5 stars
@LoriShemek @perseveralways I tried it there was no after taste or bitterness like others. But I dont use sugar much, never drank sodas etc Sweets chocolate are my downfall
RT @JuliaGrantham2: Southern France a few yrs ago Wont it be wonderful to travel again? https://t.co/SbFeFVWw8p

This is fantastic! So uplifting, I love it! I miss being at live events, symphony, opera, theater; the energy, the enthusiasm is contagious. Im sure most of us miss any human connection. I havent seen my family for I over a year. https://t.co/SJsRketZEL
In Miami with Cameron Jack a few years ago. Lucky us, Our hotel was on the gorgeous beach #Miami #travel https://t.co/gdIl0MWzJm

@arizdare1 You are so kind Mark. What a sweet thing to say. That embroidery is beautiful, looks terrific on the jacket. Im sure she loved it. And Im sure she other angels are watching over you. Many blessings to you
@arizdare1 Im sorry for your loss Mark My mother died a long time ago, 8 days after my father. I love the colors in your art, the composition the yellow flower is lovely, a color of happiness
Im back painting suddenly 5 hours flew by. Some of my brushes oil paints were my mothers. #Art #oilpainting https://t.co/jl9wDm2VOT
@LuC4zNytMare Ive only been once would love to return. My close friend is Hawaiian- we met in college friends ever since. As a Hyatt exec, shes lived all over
What can I say? Crazy Maxx Hes full of personality https://t.co/kdbYlEYWJm
